text: The following lists events that happened in 1958 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Ásgeir Ásgeirsson *Prime Minister - Hermann Jónasson, Emil Jónsson ==Events== ==Births== Páll Guðlaugsson *23 April - Hilmar Örn Hilmarsson, musician and art director *22 July - Sævar Jónsson, footballer *28 July - Pétur Ormslev, footballer *30 August - Sigrún Edda Björnsdóttir, actress and writer *8 September - Ólína Þorvarðardóttir, politician. *9 September - Páll Guðlaugsson, footballer ===Full date missing=== *Ragnar Th. Sigurdsson, photographer ==Deaths== Ásgrímur Jónsson *5 April - Ásgrímur Jónsson, painter (b. 1876) ==References== Category:1950s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1958 in Iceland
